metric.name: functionExecutionsCompleted
metric.description: Total number of completed function.execute() calls.

metric.name: functionExecutionsCompletedProcessingTime
metric.description: Total time consumed for all completed function invocations.

metric.name: resultsSentToResultCollector
metric.description: Total number of results sent to the ResultCollector.

metric.name: resultsReceived
metric.description: Total number of results received and passed to the ResultCol­lector.

metric.name: functionExecutionsHasResultCompletedProcessingTime
metric.description: Total time consumed for all completed execute() calls where hasResult() returns true.

metric.name: functionExecutionsHasResultRunning
metric.description: A gauge indicating the number of currently active execute() calls for functions where hasResult() returns true.

metric.name: functionExecutionsExceptions
metric.description: Total number of Exceptions Occured while executing func­tions.
